page.title: 20EVENTS IN WOODLAND
page.content:
Just after Easter the juniors from our school went on a visit to{London. We went with two other schools on a 3 day visit.The visit was brilliant and was very interesting. {THE STREETS OF LONDON London was noisy and packed with people, The traffic it was busy. The smell was from the fumes and gas, All this made me dizzy.
The streets are hard,the grass is soft, Like the softest bed on earth. The River Thames flows silently, Past H.M.S. Belfast's berth.
We found the{History and Science {Museums}the most interesting places we went to.There was lots to do in{London but I wouldn't like to live there.
